citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Some medications have been stored and used past the "Use-by" date listed on the container: Metronidazole (Use-by:
6/2021) and Toltrazuril (Use-by: 8/2021). Expired medications might not be effective in preventing or treating the
condition it is used for. Ensure that medications that are in use are not expired.
Correct from this day forward.

The facility has decided to use tags instead of tattoo for official identification. Tags have not been acquired yet, however
each dog is identified by name tags on enclosures. Official identification such as tags are required for dogs by the
Welfare Act and is important in health tracking and husbandry purposes. Ensure that adult dogs have official
identification.

Dogs and Cats on Hand (APHIS 7006) was incomplete for 4 dogs:
"Lori" F, white cavapoo, "Lisa" brown F poodle, a F border collie and F golden retriever temporarily at the kennel for
breeding. Accurate and current records are required by the Welfare Act and can be important if animal health tracing
needs to be done. Ensure that APHIS 7006 (Dogs on Hand) is kept up to date with complete information.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Some medications have been stored and used past the "Use-by" date listed on the container:  Metronidazole (Use-by: 
6/2021) and Toltrazuril (Use-by: 8/2021).  Expired medications might not be effective in preventing or treating the 
condition it is used for.  Ensure that medications that are in use are not expired. 
 
Correct from this day forward. 
2.50(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Time and method of identification. 
The facility has decided to use tags instead of tattoo for official identification.  Tags have not been acquired yet, however 
each dog is identified by name tags on enclosures.  Official identification such as tags are required for dogs by the 
Welfare Act and is important in health tracking and husbandry purposes.  Ensure that adult dogs have official 
identification. 
2.75(a)(2)  Repeat
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
Dogs and Cats on Hand (APHIS 7006) was incomplete for 4 dogs: 
"Lori" F, white cavapoo, "Lisa" brown F poodle, a F border collie and F golden retriever temporarily at the kennel for

breeding.  Accurate and current records are required by the Welfare Act and can be important if animal health tracing 
needs to be done.  Ensure that APHIS 7006 (Dogs on Hand) is kept up to date with complete information. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
